comment: Dr. Evans has a long paper due at the end of the class but through out the semester she provides you with all the tools to do well on the paper. There are a few quizzes and discussions post but as long as you do the work and really try you should be fine. I found the zoom calls she did really helpful. Make sure you manage your time well for this
Dr. Evans is a relatively easy grader, and always gave me really nice feedback. The final paper is the only hard part of this class, but she helps you out as much as she can.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--So many papers

comment: currently in the summer class, it is going great and she is very helpful with all assignments that lead up to final research project. There is a bit of work and it is fast paced so make sure to stay on top of it. Overall great class and professor and manageable in the summer
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is a horrible teacher. She actually does nothing to teach you the material so youre actually just learning it yourself. VERY SLOW GRADER and merciless. I turned in somethings late and I got flat ZEROs on all those assignments. Super ruthless. She takes forever to respond to emails.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: This is her first year at KSU so I feel as if she's trying to "prove herself" somewhat. She is overwhelming our research methods class and I don't think she realizes it. 3 EXTREMELY detailed exams along with a double digit paged course paper that requires lengthy updates through the semester. Seniors have way too much on our plate already, thanks!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects
